subject: Clarification on considering experience of In-hand DPR of National Highways Works of other Executing Agencies of MoRT&H (i.e. MoRTH; NHIDCL; PWD NH Wing; BRO; State Bridge & Road Corporations) during evaluation of Bids for Authority Engineer/Independent Engineer Services - reg.
text: #Rar <wiv TTHRf gferaz<ut (Tsw5 wdev er THNf FFIR, IRG FSR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Truda va #-5 & 6, 49er-10, ERq,; # fcrft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TM/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/ 2025 Policy Circular No.10.2.42/ 2025 dated 18th February, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. SRDQ-11013/1/2025-SRDGQ Division (Comp. No. 272330)} Sub: Clarification on considering experience of In-hand DPR of National Highways Works of other Executing Agencies of MoRTAH (i.e. MoRTH, NHIDCL, PWD NH BRO, State Bridge & Road Corporations_ during evaluation of Bids for Authority Engineer/Independent Engineer Services reg: It has been observed that during evaluation of Bids for Authority Engineer /Independent Engineer Services, many Technical Divisions at NHAI HQ ROs / PIUs are not considering the experience of In-hand DPR of other Executing Agencies of MoRT&H (i.e. MoRTH, NHIDCL, PWD NH BRO, State Bridge & Road Corporations) who are also involved in Development & Maintenance of National Highways. 2  Therefore it is hereby clarified that  experience of In-hand DPR as  claimed by Consultant for Projects of National Highways of all   Executing Agencies of MoRT&H (i.e. MoRTH, NHIDCL, PWD NH Wing, BRO, State & Road Corporations) shall be considered during evaluation of Bids for Authority Engineer / Independent Engineer Services in NHAI. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3. Web Admin for circulation: 'M 7 7 9 NHAL Wing; Wing, Bridge 80x/25 Copy
